name: No70: Eye of Basir
description: ''No70: Eye of Basir'' is a story based first person perspective adventure game which focused on investigation. Players will help Aras and Erhan to solve the mystery about Basir and the No70 house.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 4160 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 690 / Radeon HD 7990 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Targetting 1080p @ 60 fps
